nextapp.echo.extras.app
Class DataGrid

java.lang.Object
  nextapp.echo.app.Component
      nextapp.echo.extras.app.DataGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, nextapp.echo.app.RenderIdSupport
public class DataGrid
extends nextapp.echo.app.Component

DataGrid component. This component is under heavy development, it should not be used except for testing purposes.

Method Detail

getColumnIndex

public java.lang.Number getColumnIndex()
Returns the first displayed column index. Either this method or getColumnPercent() will return null.

Returns:
the first displayed column index

getColumnPercent

public java.lang.Number getColumnPercent()
Returns the percent index of columns which will be displayed (0 = leftmost columns, 100 = rightmost columns). Either this method or getColumnIndex() will return null.

Returns:
the percent index of columns which will be displayed

getModel

public DataGridModel getModel()
Retrieves the model.

Returns:
the model

getRowIndex

public java.lang.Number getRowIndex()
Returns the first displayed row index. Either this method or getRowPercent() will return null.

Returns:
the first displayed row index

getRowPercent

public java.lang.Number getRowPercent()
Returns the percent index of rows which will be displayed (0 = topmost rows, 100 = bottommost rows). Either this method or getRowIndex() will return null.

Returns:
the percent index of rows which will be displayed

setColumnIndex

public void setColumnIndex(java.lang.Number newValue)
Sets the first displayed column index. This will override any setting configured using setColumnPercent()

Parameters:
newValue - the new first displayed column index

setColumnPercent

public void setColumnPercent(java.lang.Number newValue)
Sets the percent index of columns which will be displayed (0 = leftmost columns, 100 = rightmost columns). This will override any setting configured using setColumnIndex()

Parameters:
newValue - the new percent column index

setModel

public void setModel(DataGridModel newValue)
Sets the model.

Parameters:
newValue - the new model (may not be null)

setRowIndex

public void setRowIndex(java.lang.Number newValue)
Sets the first displayed row index. This will override any setting configured using setRowPercent()

Parameters:
newValue - the new first displayed row index

setRowPercent

public void setRowPercent(java.lang.Number newValue)
Sets the percent index of rows which will be displayed (0 = topmost rows, 100 = bottommost rows). This will override any setting configured using setRowIndex()

Parameters:
newValue - the new percent row index
